answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources that you may find helpful.
This article includes a number of case studies from partnerships formed between local government and businesses for parks and recreation.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302938/Parks_and_Recreation_Departments_Partner_with_Local_Organizations_and_Everyone_Wins
This article from the Maryland Municipal League discusses unique ways to fund parks. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3170/Creative_Ways_to_Fund_Playgrounds
The City of Casa Grande partnered with the Francisco Grande Hotel & Resort to help build more parks and recreation centers.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100829/The_Casa_Grande_Performance_Institute
The Stonyfield Farm 'Bid with Your Lid' Campaign helps to support the Ann Arbor, MI parks and recreation department.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100521/Stonyfield_Farm_Bid_with_Your_Lid_Campaign_Benefits_Ann_Arbor_MI_Parks__Rec
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Willie Hall
text: Does anyone have information regarding financial sponsorship of local parks, the property or teh equipment?
title: Park sponsorship, corporate and citizen
